Player History
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 5/5/1976 (Going to SF: RF G. Foster. Going to PHI: LF J. Royster, LF H. Washington, 2B G. Pryor)...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1976, off Ed Figueroa (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1976, off Leon Everitt (LA)...
Injured on 9/4/1983 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/9/1984 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Houston on 9/11/1984...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/9/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $2,100,000 per year...
